title: [Health] New study suggests that psychiatric conditions like anxiety and depression may be part of a prodromal phase of Multiple Sclerosis

[Neuroscience] The omega-3 fatty acid DHA may help protect the brain from an unhealthy dietâ€™s effects by curbing fat-induced inflammation at the cellular source. A study found pre-treating brain cells with DHA protected against pro-inflammatory gene expression prompted by the saturated fatty acid palmitate.
